titleStmt.title: Miscellany poems by Mr. Dennis with select translations of Horace, Juvenal, Mons. Boileau's Epistles, Satyrs, &c., and Æsop's Fables, in burlesque verse ; to which is added, The passion of Byblis, with some critical reflections on Mr. Oldham, and his writings ; with letters and poems.
titleStmt.author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D. Metamorphoses. Liber 9. English. Selections.
Dennis, John, 1657-1734.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition with large additions.

notesStmt.note: Added t.p. on prelim. p. [39]: The passion of Byblis.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
